pageContent: Objective: To investigate structural changes in the tumor and nontumor tissues of the prostate in patients with its cancer (PC) after treatment with high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) in combination with androgen deprivation to clarify criteria for evaluating the efficiency of treatment.

metaData.source:
[Salvage external beam radiation therapy for prostate cancer recurrence after high-intensity focused ultrasound ablation]
